name: Arena of Death (Zhuraj)
description:
Hi, 

Thank you for playing my game. It was created during the Gamedev.tv Gamejam 2022. It's my very first released game. And I hope you like it. 

I done all the Graphics my own. I'm also new to Pixelart but I like the style. 

I Know that the game is still a little bit buggy. Please leave a comment if you want me to extend the game or add a special feature. 

Changelog 
  • v0.0.4(23.05.2022)
    • MVP - Prototype of the Game with placeholder graphics.
  • v0.0.5(24.05.2022)
    • Added Torture Device to the Arena :)
    • New Groundtexture for the Arena.
    • Added first own Props Graphics
    • Made the "Controls Panel" hideable
  • v.0.0.6(25.05.2022) 
    • Created a new Healtpoint and Staminabar. 
    • New Lava Texture added 
    • Background Music added
    • Added Screenshaking when the Player gets Damage
  • v0.1.0 
    • Game Jam submission
